title: The Grassy Knoll
body: What really happened on that fateful day in Dallas? Some say there was another shooter on that hill.

title: The Roswell Incident
body: Was it a weather balloon or something more? Some say the government is hiding the truth from us.

title: What happened to Madeleine McCann?
body: The 3-year-old disappeared from her hotel room in Portugal in 2007. Some say her parents were involved.

title: The differerent rites of Freemasonry
body: Some say there are different rites of Freemasonry, each with its own secrets and rituals.

title: MK Ultra and the UNABOMBER
body: Was Ted Kaczynski a victim of the CIA's mind control experiments? Some say he was a patsy.

title: The LBJ Connection
body: What did Lyndon B. Johnson know about the JFK assassination? Some say he was involved.
